heading: Wednesday Night
text: Variable clouds. Very slight chance of a shower near the Massachusetts border. Patchy valley fog. Lows in the low to mid 50s, except mid 40s to around 50 northeast and in the Adirondacks. Winds becoming light, variable to south, except south 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Thursday
text: Patchy valley fog early, then mostly sunny. Highs from the upper 70s to mid 80s. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 15 mph.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Partly cloudy south. Periods of clouds north. Slight chance of a shower from the Adirondacks and Route 2 northward, mainly over high terrain. Lows from the upper 40s to mid 50s, except mid to upper 40s in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley. Winds becoming north to northwest at 5 to 10 mph.
